April 4, 2018 / 10:35 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Nicholas Financial Says Entered Amendment To Existing Loan & Security Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - Nicholas Financial Inc: 
* NICHOLAS FINANCIAL SAYS ON MARCH 30 ENTERED INTO AMENDMENT TO EXISTING LOAN & SECURITY AGREEMENT GOVERNING TERMS & CONDITIONS OF CREDIT FACILITY 
* NICHOLAS FINANCIAL SAYS ‍AMENDMENT EXTENDS MATURITY DATE BY 1 YR TO MARCH 31, 2019 - SEC FILING​​ 
* NICHOLAS FINANCIAL INC - AMENDMENT REDUCES MAXIMUM AMOUNT CO MAY BORROW UNDER CREDIT FACILITY TO $200 MLN Source text: ( bit.ly/2q3Ujoz ) Further company coverage:
